extension-point.name: importer
extension-point.documentation:
The simple importer uses the nuxeo-platform-importer-core to import files into NXCM. The different variables are read from the contribution to the SimpleImporter service. They are:
- path in the repository of the Mailbox into which we import the files - maximum number of thread to be used - the factory to use to create Case and CaseItem - the path on the filesystem of the directory containing the file to import
mailboxPath 5 org.nuxeo.cm.core.service.importer.CaseManagementCaseItemDocumentFactory /tmp/testImport
